Room.Name: The Blue Training Room
Room.ShortDescription: Now that you have defeated the Blue Warrior, you are worthy of training.
Room.LongDescription: This is the training location for the Warrior Class. If you have the money to train, you may do so now. If you do not have the money, you will have to come back at a later time and defeat the Blue Warrior again. The training academy cannot afford to train people for free.
